contest-event.event-date:
Feb. 27, 1966 D Bolton,Wigan and St Helens Contest (Section B)
Bolton,Wigan and St Helens Contest (Section B) 0 Test Piece Contest
bolton-wigan-and-st-helens-contest-section-b
None
Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Civic Hall, Lowton, Lancashire Prizes - 1st £10 and trophy, 2nd £6 and trophy, 3rd £4 and trophy, 4th cup. Best cornet, euphonium and trombone - Haigh. Best horn - Golborne. Best basses - Rivington and Adlington. 10 bands competed.
March 18, 2013, 9:05 p.m. May 20, 2015, 10:39 p.m.
1 Haigh Prize William Haydock Indian Summer
2 Golborne Band Joe Houlton Othello
3 Rivington and Adlington Band John Broomhead La Favorita
4 North Ashton Prize Les Naylor Snowdon Fantasy
Unknown Result Hindley Fred Whittle The Barber of Seville - selection
Unknown Result Bolton (Hoover) Band C. Moore Petite Suite de Ballet
Unknown Result Blackburn and Darwen Band Albert Walmsley Homage to Pharaoh
Unknown Result Eaton Works Band C. Jeffries Moses in Egypt [arr. Greenwood]
Unknown Result Trinity Girls Band J. L. Newbiggin Passing Moods
Unknown Result Norman Memorial Band Unknown
